T02D3161:181a-1: padma narte shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3161:181a-3: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3161:181a-4: sngar bshad pa'i tshogs stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rdzas
T02D3161:181a-5: la sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng
T02D3161:181a-6: du yi ge hr'i: dkar po rnam par bsam zhing
T02D3161:181a-7: / de yongs su gyur pa las kyang padma gar
T02D3161:181a-8: gyi dbang phyug gi gdams ngag rje btsun 'phags pa
T02D3161:181a-9: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgom par
T02D3161:181a-10: / bya ba ni / zhal gcig phyag bco brgyad
T02D3161:181a-11: skyil krung phyed pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ral
T02D3161:181a-12: pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa /
T02D3161:181a-13: phyag thams cad kyis sna tshogs padma bsnams pa //
T02D3161:181a-14: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3161:181a-15: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs na sgrol ma dang ni
T02D3161:181a-16: nor bzangs dang khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin ngas
T02D3161:181a-17: pa / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bz'a mnga' ba'o //
T02D3161:181a-18: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ba yang /
T02D3161:181a-19: aom hr'i: padma narte shva ra h'um /
T02D3161:181a-20: nad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phan yon chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02D3161:181a-21: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
